XII.i.2.B.2.b
.
Who May Qualify for Housebound Benefits Under 38 CFR 3.351(e) and (f)
Only surviving spouses who are receiving or entitled to receive DIC or Survivors Pension may qualify for the housebound rate under
38 CFR 3.351(e) and (f)
.
